text: 1.5: FG 26.16-18; Ro 12.3; 15.18; 1 Ko 15.10; Ga 2.7-9; Ef 3.8Zisas Krais ŋaarar panan Fhe Bakɨme fhura nzan kora muuŋgiap, ana zɨ kɨvɨr zav Fhe Bakɨme won buna vhuueŋ bun suanga ŋaarar muun zav nzan farasegi. Ana mba tɨvar muuŋgirim, mba harigi fhaiŋ ŋguir ki ntɨɨrir kamɨnga, mbe zam Zisas Krais khothɨgɨp, ana zɨn ŋgɨrga.
